text: Year 47 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. In this year Julius Caesar was Dictator of the Roman Republic. == Events == * Caesar stops a mutiny * Caesar invades Africa * Cleopatra VII promotes her younger brother Ptolemy XIV of Egypt to co-ruler * Julius Caesar and his ally Cleopatra VII of Egypt defeat the forces of the rival Egyptian Queen Arsinoe IV * Caesar defeats Pharnaces II of Pontus, king of the Bosporus, in the Battle of Zela * Feng Yuan becomes consort to Emperor Yuan of the Han Dynasty == Births == * Prince Caesarion of Egypt, later Pharaoh Ptolemy XV (d. 30 BC) == Deaths == * Ptolemy XIII Theos Philopator, Pharaoh of Egypt (b. 62 or 61 BC) *
title: 47 BC
